item.title: MASPTv2 - Mobile Application Security and Penetration Testing Course
item.description: So about three weeks ago I won an “Elite” edition of the new mobile penetration testing course from eLearnSecurity by watching their webinar and being randomly selected. I’m really excited about this course and have been getting started now that it’s been released. I really did not expect to win either! This really helps being on a student budget, and will be relevant to the mobile development module at Abertay University next semester, I’ll be posting a review once I finish and pass the course.
